Billtrust | Senior Software Developers (2) | Lawrenceville, NJ | Full-time | ONSITE

ABOUT BILLTRUST: https://www.billtrust.com | Private, financial software company providing a flexible, automated, cloud-based product portfolio for Payment Cycle Management and A/R solutions. Our platforms process $15B+ annually and help companies like Kraft Foods, Coca-Cola, and New Balance Athletics get paid faster and more efficiently.

HIRING: Two (2) Senior Software Developers for different teams: 1> Senior Software Developer (full-stack) for our Collections product/team, "greenfield" development initiative for a highly-customizable CRM for credit professionals. 2> Senior Software Developer (back-end) for our Payments team to help build a more modern payments infrastructure + highly-scalable, transactional APIs.

STACK: > .NET Core, Docker, Node > Angular, RXJS, Docker > AWS, Jenkins, Git/GitLab > MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, RDS

MORE INFO: Careers @ billtrust.com/careers Video @ bit.ly/Billtrust_Video Github @ https://github.com/billtrust

CONTACT: Feel free to apply directly on our site, or preferably email me at mspiron@billtrust.com. -Marc Spiron, Lead Talent Acquisition Partner @ Billtrust
